Project Administrators - has all access to everything. Except they cannot change anything in DJango-Panel.
Project Owners - has all access to everything.
ITSO Administrator - they can trigger devices and edit and delete but cannot classrooms and other such.
ITSO Supervisor - they can view only logs and classrooms but cannot change their states. (Assistants, students, some shit.)
Professor - Normal View, they can trigger classrooms but cannot change all states of everything.



They should be allowed but cannot delete
Enlisted Course SChed
Student Sections
Classroom Declaa


Difference between ITSO Supervisor and admin?
member cannot change anything, while admin can do anything. And override is accessible for admin while member is not.

Combine schedules / action logs or logs / classrooms into one HTML

action logs and recent logs are the same output
